channel.title: Hi guys, Indie Hacker here
channel.description:
Hey guys,
My name is Daniel, and I'm an Indie Hacker. That means I work on a few different projects at the time, one of them being funden.app.
Like they say, bootstrapping until you can is the best way to learn.
Great to be here!
